mdRecord.dcterms:title: McCue Center
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gross, Stephanie
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: Lisa Eorio, a researcher with the Nursing School's Southeastern Rural Mental Health Center, works out at the McCue Center, the University's Athletic Training/Sports Medicine department, aided by its director Joe Gieck. Eorio, who has MS, is sitting on the large rubber ball to improve balance while lifting weights.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
